*Component items*:
  * *Stomach sensory data* (*stomach-sensory-data*)
   * Stomach - stomach nutrition sensor (stomach-nutrition-sensor -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG]): sense independently to tongue and oral taste receptors glucose, carbohydrates proteins, and fats
  * *Stomach gastrointestinal tract* (*stomach-gastrointestinal-tract*)
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muscularis_mucosae Stomach - outer longitudinal and inner circular smooth muscles] ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PPG AVA.PN.PSYM.PPG] -> [HumanMusclesTorso stomach-wall]): acetylcholine activates muscarinic receptors on smooth muscles - increasing motility of the stomach
   * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intestinal_gland Stomach - mucosal gastric glands] ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_GUT AVA.PN.PSYM.GUT] -> [HumanMusclesTorso stomach-mucosal-gastric-glands]): acetylcholine activates muscarinic receptors cause an increase in gastric juice secretion
   * Stomach - enzyme glands (stomach -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_NOD AVA.PN.SG.NOD]): secretes protein-digesting enzymes called proteases and strong acids to aid in food digestion; digestion; nutrition sensor; some absorption
   * Stomach - small intestine (small-intestine -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_NOD AVA.PN.SG.NOD]): where most chemical digestion takes place; food from stomach is allowed into duodenum through pylorus by pyloric sphincter; absorb nutrients from ingested food
   * Stomach - duodentum (duodentum -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_NOD AVA.PN.SG.NOD]): food intake regulation, via glucoreception in taste receptors
   * Stomach - colon (colon -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_NOD AVA.PN.SG.NOD]): extracts water and salt from solid wastes; storing waste
  * *Stomach extractors* (*stomach-extractors*)
   * Stomach - spleen (spleen -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_NOD AVA.PN.SG.NOD]): red pulp - blood filter, removes old red blood cells, holds a reserve of blood, recycles iron; white pulp - synthesizes antibodies in its white pulp and removes antibody-coated bacteria and antibody-coated blood cells by way of blood and lymph node circulation
   * Stomach - kidney (kidney -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_NOD AVA.PN.SG.NOD]): regulating acid-base balance, electrolyte concentrations, extracellular fluid volume, blood pressure, filter to urine
